channel.title: Weapon weapon_assassin_glock is missing custom brass ejection file.
channel.description:
Hello, I've found a bug with the Steam version of the game. Everytime i shoot the Glock, the console spams with the "Weapon weapon_assassin_glock is missing custom brass ejection file." message.
It's a bit annoying for me because i have to pay attention to the console with developer enabled and i have this message everytime i shoot the Glock. Well, it's not a big issue, But i would like it fixed.
I will leave a screenshot about the problem below, and sorry my bad english.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/iRjhjUW.jpg[/img]

item.title: Weapon weapon_assassin_glock is missing custom brass ejection file.
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
And my avitar was taken before the perm from hell. :weeping:

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon weapon_assassin_glock is missing custom brass ejection file.
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

wait, you guys actually play with the console ON all the time? how utterly annoying that would be.

Bingo.
Ignore or disable console.
Problem fixed.

Maybe they could modify the code replacing the assassin Glock to item_weapon_glock in the impulse command.
I know because i’ve learn coding.

item.source: Weapon weapon_assassin_glock is missing custom brass ejection file.

item.title: Weapon weapon_assassin_glock is missing custom brass ejection file.
item.dc:creator: wrkq
item.description:
Did you use one of the “all weapons” cheats?
IIRC that by mistake gives you also the weapon used by the assasin NPC, which overwrites “player standard” glock and messes things up.

Read full topic
